p: GraphPad 7.0 was applied for statistical analysis with all data presented as mean ± SD. t test and one-way analysis of variance were used to compare the differences between two or more groups. Tukey's multiple comparisons test was applied for multiple comparisons post hoc. Correlation between the expression levels of miR-34b-5p and TNF-α, IL-1β, IL-6, SCr, and BUN in the septic AKI patients was measured by the Pearson correlation coefficient. p < 0.05 was considered of statistical significance.
